text.headline: Miely Ray Cyrus
text.text: Miely Ray Cyrus is an American singer, songwriter, actress and also the founder of Happy Hippie.

text.headline: Little Miely
text.text: Destiny Hope Cyrus was born November 23, 1992, in Franklin, Tennessee. Her birth name, Destiny Hope, Destiny Hope Cyrus was born November 23, 1992, in Franklin, Tennessee. Her birth name, Destiny Hope, later shortened to Miely, because she often smiled as an infant. She changed her name to Miley Ray Cyrus;

text.headline: Career Beginnings
text.text:
After his father took her to see a 2001 Mirvish production of Mamma Mia! at the Royal Alexandra Theatre, Cyrus grabbed his arm and told him,this is what I want to do, daddy. I want to be an actress. She began taking singing and acting classes at studio in Toronto.

She played minor roles in the television series Doc and the film Big Fish in her childhood.

media.caption: Strring in the Disney Channel Telivision

text.headline: Hannah Montana
text.text: Cyrus auditioned for the Disney Channel television series Hannah Montana when she was eleven years old. She auditioned for the role of the title character's best friend, but was called to audition for the lead role instead.

text.headline: Song: The Best of the world in Hannah Montana
text.text: The series premiered in March 2006 to the largest audience for a Disney Channel program, and quickly ranked among the highest-rated series on basic cable. The instant success of the series led to Cyrus being the teen idol. She also released a record in Oct that year, which was a great success, topping the Billbord 200 chart in USA

text.headline: A great song SEE YOU AGAIN
text.text: Months after the release of Hannah Montana project, See You Again (2007) was released as the lead single from the album. The song was a commercial success, and had sold over two million copies in USsince it release.

text.headline: Second studio album: Breakout
text.text: The album boasted the highest first week sales of her career thus far, and became her third to top the Billboard 200.Cyrus later starred with John Travolta in the animated film Bolt (2008), her debut as a theatrical actress. The film was a critical and commercial sucess earning her a Golden Globe nomination.

text.headline: Billboard ranked her as the fourth , best-selling femaile artist of 2009
text.text: In March 2009, Cyrus released The Climb (2009) as a single from the soundtrack to the Hannah Montana feature film. It was met with a warm critical and commercial reaction, becoming a crossover hit in both pop and country music formats. Another song Party in the U.S.A. went on to become one of Cyrus' most successful singles to date, and is considered one of her signature songs.

text.headline: The third studio album: Can't Be Tamed
text.text: The album featured a more dance-oriented sound than her prior releases, and caused a considerable amount of controversy because of its lyrical content and Cyrus' live performances.It sold 106,000 copies in its first week of release, and became her first studio album not to top the Billboard 200 chart in the United States

text.headline: Turning point for the fourth studio album
text.text: Opting to re-establish her music career instead of focusing on her film career as originally planned, Cyrus began planning the project in late 2012.Described by Cyrus as dirty south hip-hop, Bangerz represents a musical departure from her earlier work, which she has grown to feel disconnected from.Bangerz received mixed to positive reviews from contemporary music critics, who praised its overall production and originality, and complimented Cyrus' public persona evolution.

media.caption: A Free Album: Miley Cyrus & Her Dead Petz

text.headline: songs for her dead petz for free downloading
text.text: Without previous promotion, Cyrus announced that Miley Cyrus & Her Dead Petz was available for free online streaming when she hosted the 2015 MTV Video Music Awards, released independently. The album is experimental and psychedelic,with elements of psychedelic pop,psychedelic rock,alternative pop,synthpop, art pop and space rock.

text.headline: Key Advisor in The Voice
text.text: She is  the key advisor during the tenth and eleventh seasons of the reality singing competition The Voice. She is the youngest judge in the show.

text.headline: New Album is coming
text.text: She firstly released the song named Malibu, which is a beautiful song in my mind. Then the song Inspired is for the LGBT, and Younger Now is song for herself.

text.headline: About Happy Hippie
text.text: The Happy Hippie Foundation is an American non-profit organization founded by entertainer Miley Cyrus in 2014. The foundation focuses on youth homelessness (particularly among LGBTQ youth), the LGBTQ community, and other vulnerable populations.
